title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details
description:
Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - The dialog details have the following issues:
a. The duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page.
i. The first and second columns could be merged.
OB:
a. The buttons are too small.
b. When the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected. However, both move buttons are enabled.
e. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off.
g. The dialog comes up huge for methods with many parameters.
EB:
a. The marking between the button and the list is too large. The top button should be aligned with the dialog top.
c. The table should have a label so it can contain a mnemonic.
d. Multiple selection should be allowed, as move up / down can be applied on more than one item.
f. The signature preview must be a label that wraps. It would be nice if the signature preview has the background color set to the same color as a hover.
h. The dialog should have a label for the table entry, so that it is clear which parameter is being edited.
SR:
1. Open the Modify Parameters dialog.
2. Observe that the buttons are too small.
3. Observe that when the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected, but both move buttons are enabled.
4. Change a parameter name to something very long and observe that the preview is cut off.
5. Open the dialog for a method with many parameters and observe that the dialog comes up huge.
6. Observe that the marking between the button and the list is too large.
7. Observe that the top button is not aligned with the dialog top.
8. Observe that the table does not have a label and cannot contain a mnemonic.
9. Select multiple items in the table and observe that move up / down can be applied to more than one item.
10. Observe that the signature preview does not wrap and should be a label.
11. Observe that the signature preview does not have the background color set to the same color as a hover.
12. Observe that it is not clear which parameter is being edited in the table.
